channel.title: How to Add Lunar Magic To my Server
channel.description: Okay my Source is Allstarscape v2 and i want to make it so when i pray at a Lunar temple i get lunar magics... i've been searching for a while and found nothing and i can't seem to find the object id for alter either... Please help Thanks! ;)

item.description:
